data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nupponen, Kari, Saldaitis, Aidas (2013): Recent records of scythridids from the islands of Socotra and Maldives in the Indian Ocean, with descriptions of two new species (Lepidoptera: Gelechioidea, Scythrididae). Zootaxa 3626 (2): 288-294, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3626.2.6
